name: RariFundPriceConsumer
description: RariFundPriceConsumer. RariFundPriceConsumer retrieves stablecoin prices from Chainlink's public price feeds (used by RariFundManager and RariFundController).

functionDecorators.name: getCurrencyPricesInUsd
functionDecorators.description: Returns the price of each supported currency in USD.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializer that sets supported ERC20 contract addresses and price feeds for each supported token.
